ronaldo the gardener.description: Ronaldo is a large marduk male, fitted in brown overalls and a black shirt. He looks deep in thought as he scans the gardens and plans his next project.
ronaldo the gardener.response: Do you have any interest in working the land, friend? The empty plot in our garden is a community plot, but no one has touched it yet. If you're interested, please feel free to plant anything you like! I can sell you gardening supplies if you would like to give it a shot.
